backend/main.mo: Motoko actor handling access control, invite codes, user profiles, and check‑ins with admin/user permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a footer‑removal feature to affected frontend files and component versions.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color variables and dark mode overrides for global theming.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point mounting the root React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app controlling auth flow, profile setup, pairing, relationship status, and navigation between paired views.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Auth button handling Internet Identity login/logout with query cache clearing and status feedback.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App layout with header, paired‑status badge, optional auth button, content wrapper, and simple footer credit.
frontend/src/features/checkins/CheckInCo: Form for submitting check‑ins with emoji, message, premium gating, and success or limit‑reached UI states.
frontend/src/features/checkins/constants: Defines the list of available emoji options and the maximum message length.
frontend/src/features/checkins/TodayStat: Displays today’s check‑in status for the user and partner, showing latest entries, counts, and loading state.
frontend/src/features/checkins/useCheckI: Fetches recent check‑in history from the backend using react‑query.
frontend/src/features/checkins/useSubmit: Handles submitting a new check‑in and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/features/checkins/useTodayC: Fetches today’s check‑ins for the user and partner.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/CheckInH: Renders a card listing past check‑ins with timestamps, authorship labels, and loading/empty states.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/Dashboar: Main dashboard showing streaks, today’s status, composer, and check‑in history tabs.
frontend/src/features/emotionalmap/Emoti: Shows a comparison of today’s emotions between user and partner and derives a simple sentiment message.
frontend/src/features/pairing/PairingCar: UI for generating invite codes and joining with a partner’s code, including copy and form logic.
frontend/src/features/pairing/useDisconn: Mutation hook to disconnect a partner and invalidate pairing‑related queries.
frontend/src/features/pairing/useInviteT: Generates and stores an invite token for partner pairing.
frontend/src/features/pairing/useJoinWit: Allows joining with a partner invite token and refreshes pairing state on success.
frontend/src/features/pairing/usePairing: Retrieves partner principal and profile to determine pairing status and partner name.
frontend/src/features/profile/ProfileSet: Modal form for creating a user profile and saving it via mutation, then refreshing profile data.
frontend/src/features/profile/useGetCall: Fetches the current user's profile from the actor with loading state adjustments.
frontend/src/features/profile/useHasPrem: Query hook that checks whether the current user has premium status.
frontend/src/features/relationshipStatus: UI for selecting and submitting a relationship status with success/error handling.
Fetches relationship status and user profile to determine chooser permissions and state flags.
Mutation for setting relationship status with permission check and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/features/settings/SettingsV: Settings UI allowing users to disconnect from a partner with confirmation and feedback.
frontend/src/features/streak/StreakSecti: Displays and animates the shared streak count when paired and data is loaded.
frontend/src/features/streak/useSharedSt: Query hook retrieving the shared streak value from the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file indicating queries are organized within feature directories.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/src/lib/checkInHelpers.ts: Utility to find the latest check‑in by a specific author from a list.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, query client, identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (query or hash), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear or retrieve them with precedence rules.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, shadows, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animation.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current state, architecture notes, known issues, and implemented features for the relationship app.
